text: what is an itch itches in the top two

very clever one it starts with the

why we take antihistamine to break the

the signal makes its way to the cerebral

most normal eating is pre receptive it

you feel the scratchiness at the base of

neuropathic itching results from damage
to the nervous system neurogenic itching
stems from chemical imbalances in the

following a liver malfunction or as the
result of taking drugs
psychogenic itching is caused by
